about_the_game:
Dive into the fast-paced world of Block & Balls, a captivating 2D arcade experience. Take on a range of levels, from easy and enjoyable to intense and heart-pounding, each offering its own unique challenges. With multiple mini-games embedded within, the fun never stops. Unleash your creativity using the intuitive level editor to craft your own custom stages and share them with friends. Compete against players worldwide on the competitive leaderboards, vying for the top spot. Get ready for an addictive gameplay experience that combines arcade action, mini-games, a level editor, and thrilling competition.




Welcome to Block & Balls, the ultimate gaming platform where a growing and creative community is listened to whose ideas are incorporated! Join this thriving community that values your input, as we work together to shape an extraordinary gaming experience. Wobbegong is committed to incorporating your feedback, ensuring Block & Balls becomes the best gaming platform ever, with your contributions and ideas at the forefront. Interact with our developers through the Discord, share your thoughts through Twitter or show your own work and ideas in the Community page. Celebrate your creativity by sharing custom levels, game modes, and ideas with fellow gamers. By the end of the year one player from the community will have risen above all the rest, the player with the fastest Hardcore time might receive a 10.000$ price (this is if Block & Balls makes this much revenue, else the developer cannot fund this)! Block & Balls offers endless fun for players of all ages so go ahead, explore and enjoy!

Welcome to Block & Balls - Let's explore the various elements that make this game truly captivating:

Star: Every level contains a star that you must collect to achieve completion. Challenge your skills and strategize to reach each star.
AmmoBlock: Keep your ammunition stocked by collecting these blocks, ensuring you have the firepower you need to conquer the challenges ahead.
MinigameStarBlock: Trigger a thrilling minigame upon impact. Successfully complete the minigame to earn a valuable star, adding an extra layer of excitement to your journey.
MinigameTimeBlock: Impact this block to activate a time-based minigame. Successfully complete it, and you'll be rewarded with a time deduction, giving you an edge in your quest.
Ball: The versatile ball can be shot, activated, deactivated, caught, and even destroyed. Master its various properties to your advantage.
Shield: Protect yourself from incoming balls and bullets with the reliable shield, granting you valuable moments of invincibility.
Smoke: These block your view, adding an element of challenge and suspense.
Black Hole: Watch out for these gravitational traps that pull in anything movable, creating unique gameplay situations.
Booster: Experience a burst of speed and momentum as the booster propels all speed up objects in a particular direction.
Electrocution Field: Stay sharp, as balls caught inside this field will be destroyed when the countdown reaches zero.
ForceField: Activate or deactivate this impenetrable shield to control the flow of the game strategically.
GravityField and Reverse GravityField: Encounter fields where gravity is applied normally or reversed, requiring you to adapt and innovate.
ElectricSource and CorruptSource: Interact with these blocks to activate or deactivate other objects, influencing the game dynamics.
Powercell: They activate and deactivate different game elements that can be powered.
Keylock: A powercell can be protected by a keylock, only if the right key is entered shall the powercell activate.
Laser and FriendlyLasers: Handle lasers with care as they destroy most objects upon contact, but there are friendly versions that won't harm stars.
LifeBlock: Face durable blocks that can withstand a certain number of hits before being destroyed.
MagnetBlock: Activates the magnetic field around your cursor, influencing object movement.
MovingBlockLooper and MovingBlockOneTime: Engage with moving blocks, some that loop back and forth and others that move just once when enabled.
NegativeAmmoBlock: Be cautious, as these blocks remove ammo.
NoBallField: Navigate carefully through these fields, where you cannot enter with ammo nor can loose balls.
PortalBlocks: Discover teleportation mechanics, moving you when hit by a ball or colliding with you.
Rotator: Deal with rotating blocks and objects attached to them, adding complexity to your gameplay.
SpedometerFast and SpedometerSlow: Face challenges based on the velocity of objects, requiring precise timing and control.
StickyWall: Experiment with objects sticking to this wall upon collision, leading to interesting interactions.
ZeroGravBlock: This block functions just like a ball without the many abilities a ball posseses.
Wall, Firewall, and OneWayWall: Interact with various types of walls, each with its distinct properties and challenges.

Destroyer: A menacing, stationary block that annihilates anything it comes into contact with. Approach with caution and devise a plan to avoid its destructive path.
LifeDestroyer: Like the Destroyer, but with a limited lifespan. It can only destroy a certain number of objects before meeting its own demise. Plan your moves strategically to outlast this formidable foe.
Bullet: Swift and relentless, this enemy destroys the player on contact if not shielded. React quickly and utilize your shield to avoid this relentless threat.
Bomb: A deadly variant of the Bullet that can penetrate through shields. Be on high alert and take evasive action to dodge these explosive menaces.
Senemy: Get ready for a chase as this enemy relentlessly pursues you. One well-aimed ball will bring it down, but beware, as it can also spell instant doom for the player on impact.
Benemy: Watch out for this dangerous foe that shoots bullets from a distance. To defeat it, you'll need precise timing to land five hits with your ball before it's taken out.
Tenemy: Stay on guard as this stationary enemy launches bombs your way. Evade the explosives and find a strategic angle to neutralize this threat.
Sawn: Similar to the Senemy, but with an eerie twist. Unaffected by obstructions, this ghost-like enemy moves freely, making it a tricky opponent to evade.

Different Level Variations:
Small Box, Big Box, Horizontal Level, Vertical Level or a mix of them all: Encounter diverse level designs that influence your movement and strategies throughout your journey.


Note: Block & Balls is an ever-evolving game, with lots of community input, with updates regularly adding new features and levels to keep the adventure fresh and exciting. Enjoy a constantly evolving experience that will challenge and entertain you with each playthrough!



LMB: Shoot
RMB: Shield

R: Restart
H: Home

A or Left Arrow: Move left
D or Right Arrow: Move Right

movies.name: BAB ~ Now the Balls are in Your Hands

name: Block & Balls

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or above
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.00 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX950
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any sound card will do!

reviews:
“I came while playing this.”
3(π)/10 – Thorsten Cielen

“Women fear me.”
9/10 – Micah Wysmans

“I'm going to kill Micah the day of 22/07/2028.”
9.5/10 – Samuel Jan Jacobs Hommers
short_description: Dive into a thrilling 2D arcade experience with Block & Balls. Easy to hard levels, exciting mini-games, a level editor and competitive leaderboards await. Challenge your skills, unleash your creativity and compete for the top spot in this addictive arcade adventure! Easy to control, hard to master.
